Bolingbrook.Lakeview Jr. High School:
'Lakeview Junior High School is a junior high school in Unincorporated Downers Grove, Illinois.
Lakeview grades are 6th, 7th, and 8th grade, residing in Downers Grove, Woodridge, and Darien.Lakeview adopted a semester-based academic calendar (replacing the previous trimester-based academic calendar) after the appointment of Mr. Tim Arnold, superintendent.
